nodes.text: The Primtara system was located in the Primtara sector, a part of the Trailing Sectors portion of the Mid Rim. It shared its name with the Primtara Offensive, a campaign in the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance.
The Primtara system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square P-15.
